menu.name: Classic Beef Burger
menu.description: Juicy grilled beef patty with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
menu.long_description: Our Classic Beef Burger features a perfectly grilled beef patty, complemented by fresh lettuce, juicy tomato, and melted cheese, all nestled in a toasted bun. This classic burger is a favorite for those who crave a savory and satisfying meal, whether for lunch or dinner. Served with crispy fries on the side, it's the ultimate comfort food.

menu.name: BBQ Beef Ribs
menu.description: Tender beef ribs with a smoky BBQ sauce.
menu.long_description: Our BBQ Beef Ribs are slow-cooked to perfection, resulting in tender, fall-off-the-bone meat. The smoky BBQ sauce, with a hint of sweetness and spice, adds depth of flavor to each bite. Whether you're a BBQ enthusiast or new to this indulgence, our ribs are served with your choice of sides for a truly satisfying meal.

menu.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
menu.description: Grilled chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, and mayo.
menu.long_description: The Grilled Chicken Sandwich is a perfect balance of tender grilled chicken breast, crisp lettuce, and ripe tomato, all smothered in creamy mayo. Served in a fresh sandwich bun, it's a lighter, healthier option without compromising on flavor. Ideal for a quick, yet delicious meal that satisfies your cravings.

menu.name: Chicken Wings
menu.description: Spicy chicken wings served with ranch dressing.
menu.long_description: Our Chicken Wings are crispy, spicy, and flavorful, served with a side of cool ranch dressing to balance out the heat. Each wing is coated in a bold sauce that packs a punch, perfect for those who love a little spice. Pair with a cold drink and enjoy these wings as an appetizer or main course.

menu.name: Kiddies Mini Burger
menu.description: Mini beef burger with cheese, perfect for kids.
menu.long_description: Our Kiddies Mini Burger is a fun-sized delight, featuring a juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese and nestled in a soft, perfectly toasted mini bun. Ideal for younger appetites, this burger is served with a side of crispy fries and a refreshing drink, making it the perfect kid-friendly meal.

menu.name: Kiddies Chicken Nuggets
menu.description: Crispy chicken nuggets served with ketchup.
menu.long_description: Our Kiddies Chicken Nuggets are crispy on the outside and tender on the inside. Each nugget is made from premium chicken, lightly breaded and fried to perfection. Paired with a side of ketchup for dipping, this meal is a hit with young diners and perfect for any occasion.

menu.name: Veggie Burger
menu.description: Delicious veggie patty with lettuce, tomato, and avocado.
menu.long_description: Our Veggie Burger is made with a savory, plant-based patty packed with flavors. It comes topped with fresh lettuce, tomato, and creamy avocado, offering a satisfying bite that’s both healthy and delicious. A great option for vegetarians or anyone looking for a lighter alternative to a traditional burger.

menu.name: Grilled Veggie Wrap
menu.description: Grilled vegetables wrapped in a soft tortilla.
menu.long_description: Our Grilled Veggie Wrap is packed with colorful, grilled vegetables, wrapped in a soft and warm tortilla. The combination of tender vegetables with the subtle seasoning creates a fresh and satisfying meal. It’s the perfect option for a light lunch or a wholesome snack.

menu.name: Veggie Salad
menu.description: Fresh veggie salad with cucumbers and tomatoes
menu.long_description: Our Veggie Salad is a refreshing combination of crisp cucumbers, juicy tomatoes, and other fresh vegetables. Lightly tossed in a vinaigrette dressing, this salad is perfect as a side dish or a healthy meal option for those looking to add more greens to their diet.

menu.name: Cheese Quesadilla
menu.description: Melted cheese in a grilled tortilla, served with salsa.
menu.long_description: Our Cheese Quesadilla features melted cheese sandwiched between two lightly toasted tortillas, creating a crispy, gooey, and delicious bite. Served with a side of fresh salsa, this dish is perfect as a light snack or a simple yet satisfying meal.

menu.name: Spicy Beef Nachos
menu.description: Tortilla chips loaded with beef, cheese, and jalapeños.
menu.long_description: Our Spicy Beef Nachos are a perfect combination of crispy tortilla chips loaded with seasoned beef, melted cheese, and spicy jalapeños. Topped with a dollop of sour cream and a sprinkle of fresh cilantro, this dish brings bold flavors in every bite. It's the ultimate shareable snack or appetizer, ideal for those who love a little heat in their meal.

menu.name: Bacon Cheeseburger
menu.description: Classic cheeseburger with crispy bacon and tomato.
menu.long_description: Our Bacon Cheeseburger is a mouthwatering classic. A perfectly grilled beef patty is topped with crispy bacon, melted cheese, and fresh tomato slices. Served in a toasted bun with lettuce, pickles, and a generous helping of ketchup and mustard, this burger is an indulgent treat for burger lovers.

menu.name: Buffalo Chicken Wrap
menu.description: Spicy buffalo chicken with lettuce and blue cheese
menu.long_description: Our Buffalo Chicken Wrap combines the perfect amount of spice with the coolness of blue cheese. Tender buffalo chicken is wrapped in a soft tortilla along with crunchy lettuce, juicy tomatoes, and a drizzle of blue cheese dressing. It's a deliciously messy, but satisfying meal that's perfect for lunch or dinner.

menu.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
menu.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, grilled chicken with Caesar dressing.
menu.long_description: Our Chicken Caesar Salad is a fresh and hearty option. Tender, grilled chicken breast sits atop crisp romaine lettuce, tossed in a creamy Caesar dressing. Topped with crunchy croutons and grated Parmesan cheese, this salad is the perfect combination of flavors and textures, ideal for a lighter meal or side.

menu.name: Kiddies Fish Fingers
menu.description: Crispy fish fingers served with tartar sauce.
menu.long_description: Our Kiddies Fish Fingers are the perfect meal for little ones. Made from tender fish fillets, these fingers are coated in a crispy breading and fried to golden perfection. Served with a side of tangy tartar sauce for dipping, they are a kid-friendly favorite that's both delicious and fun to eat.

menu.name: Mini Cheese Pizza
menu.description: A mini cheese pizza perfect for kids.
menu.long_description: Our Mini Cheese Pizza is designed for smaller appetites, featuring a soft, doughy crust topped with a generous layer of melted mozzarella cheese. It's simple, yet irresistible, and makes the perfect meal for kids. Pair with a side of veggies or fries to make it a complete meal.

menu.name: Spicy Veggie Tacos
menu.description: Soft tacos filled with spicy grilled veggies and avocado.
menu.long_description: Our Spicy Veggie Tacos are packed with flavor. Soft corn tortillas are filled with spicy grilled veggies, including peppers, onions, and zucchini, topped with fresh avocado slices. Finished off with a squeeze of lime and a sprinkle of cilantro, these tacos are a vibrant, plant-based option that’s both healthy and delicious.

menu.name: Falafel Wrap
menu.description: Crunchy falafel with lettuce, tomato, and tahini in wrap.
menu.long_description: Our Falafel Wrap features crispy, golden falafel balls made from chickpeas and herbs, wrapped in a soft tortilla with crisp lettuce, juicy tomato, and creamy tahini sauce. This healthy, Mediterranean-inspired wrap is perfect for those looking for a meat-free yet filling meal.

menu.name: Loaded Fries
menu.description: Fries topped with cheese, jalapeños, and sour cream.
menu.long_description: Our Loaded Fries are a perfect indulgence. Crispy golden fries are smothered in melted cheese, topped with spicy jalapeños, and finished off with a generous dollop of sour cream. These fries make for the perfect appetizer or a tasty side dish to any main course.

menu.name: Mozzarella Sticks
menu.description: Crispy mozzarella sticks served with marinara sauce.
menu.long_description: Our Mozzarella Sticks are crispy on the outside, with a gooey, cheesy interior. Served with a side of marinara sauce for dipping, these mozzarella sticks are the perfect combination of texture and flavor, making them a great appetizer or side dish to enjoy with your meal.
